name: Zaprite Payment Gateway – Accept Bitcoin and Fiat payments in WooCommerce
author: zaprite

sections.description:
Zaprite Payment Gateway for WooCommerce enables your ecommerce store to accept Bitcoin, Lightning, Liquid and card payments in one unified Checkout experience.
This plugin integrates seamlessly with your WooCommerce Checkout, providing a fast, secure, and low-cost payment option for your customers.

Features:
– Accept Bitcoin, Lightning and Liquid payments directly to your wallet.
– Accept card payments via Stripe or Square.
– Easy setup and configuration within WooCommerce settings.
– QR code generation for easy payments.
– Transaction history and CSV export for easy reconciliation.

Why Choose Zaprite?
– Lower transaction fees compared to traditional payment methods.
– Enhanced security and privacy for your customers.
– No intermediaries or third parties, receive payments directly.

Demo

To see a live demo, please visit https://woo.zaprite.dev.

Support

For support and feature requests, please visit https://zaprite.zendesk.com/hc/en-ca.

Additional Notes

Zaprite is not affiliated with or endorsed by WooCommerce, WordPress, or any cryptocurrency entities. This plugin is developed and maintained by independent developers.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the zaprite-payment-gateway folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to WooCommerce > Settings > Payments.
  4. Click on ‘Zaprite’ to configure the payment gateway settings.
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  • Update: Add method to order metadata.

1.0.3

  • Update: Add payment info in the order metadata.

1.0.2

  • Update: Use standard Authorization header.

1.0.1

  • Bug fix: 3 decimal currency support and conversion fix.

1.0.0

  • Initial release: Zaprite payment gateway with Bitcoin, Lightning and card Checkout support.

sections.reviews:
Bitcoin and Fiat Payments made easy

By kornpow on April 3, 2024

This plugin and the Zaprite service is an great way to accept payments on your website in variety of currencies. Zaprite supports a number of custodial and non-custodial methods of accepting bitcoin, and allows you to seamlessly swap between them so your customers always have a great payment experience.

The only payment gateway you need

By themochabean on March 16, 2024

As a wordpress developer, I love having a consistent, beautiful checkout experience for all my customers, but I also want to make sure the customer can pay how they feel most comfortable. With Zaprite you get all of this.

Because Zaprite connects with Stripe or Square and also accepts bitcoin in numerous ways (on-chain, lightning, custodial, non-custodial, you name it), it truly is all-in-one payment solution and the plugin rocks!

Great plugin and will be using it my projects going forward!
